author: mmusich
body:
General cleanup. This PR includes:
- preparation of a new metadata for tier-0 uploads of the `SiStripGainsAfterAbortGap` workflow
- wf. 1001.0 now consumes directly the `autoPCL` dictionary (as Tier-0 does)
- fixing `AlCaHarvesting` and `autoPCL` to run in production the `SiStripGainsAfterAbortGap` workflow

attn: @dimattia
title: 81X  SiStrip Gains PCL cleanup
